subject: Basketball
Polls and Public Opinion
lead_paragraph: Almost two-thirds of the N.B.A.’s general managers picked the Nets, who finished 22-44 last season, as the league’s most improved team, according to poll results published Monday.
snippet: Almost two-thirds of the N.B.A.’s general managers picked the Nets, who finished 22-44 last season, as the league’s most improved team, according to poll results published Monday.
